All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AnimationManager
The AnimationManager class is responsible for pre-loading and managing sprite animations to prevent performance issues.
Bomb
The `Bomb` class represents a bomb entity in a game.
Bomberman
The `Bomberman` class represents the player-controlled character in the game.
BombManager
The BombManager class manages all the bombs in the game.
BombPowerup
 
ClownBullet
The ClownBullet class represents a bullet shot by a clown enemy in the game.
ClownMask
The ClownMask class represents the clown boss in super bomberman.
CollisionChecker
The CollisionChecker class handles collision detection for the game's entities.
Consts
 
Controller
This class handles the key events for the game.
Cuppen
The Cuppen class represents an enemy character called Cuppen in the game.
DebugWindow
 
Denkyun
The Denkyun class represents an enemy character called Denkyun in the game.
DrawPane
This class represents a secondary JFrame for drawing the grid and its components as colored squares.
Enemy
The Enemy class represents an abstract enemy entity in the game.
EnemyManager
The EnemyManager class manages all the enemies in the game.
Entity
 
Explosion
Represents an explosion entity in the game.
FaralsBoss
The FaralsBoss class represents a boss enemy called Farals in the game.
GameState
 
LevelManager
The LevelManager class handles loading and reloading game levels.
LivesPowerup
 
Loop
 
MenuHandler
The MenuHandler class is responsible for handling menu interactions and key events in the game.
MouseManager
The MouseManager class is responsible for handling mouse input and managing player movement.
NutsStar
The NutsStar class represents an enemy character called NutsStar in the game.
Pakupa
The Pakupa class represents an enemy character called Pakupa in the game.
PassThroughPowerup
 
PowerUp
Represents a power-up entity in the game.
PowerupManager
The PowerupManager class manages all the powerups in the game.
Puropen
The Puropen class represents an enemy character called Puropen in the game.
RadiusPowerup
 
RainPowerup
 
SaveManager
The SaveManager class is responsible for managing saved data such as wins, losses, and progress.
SkullPowerup
 
SoundManager
The SoundManager class is responsible for managing the game's sound effects and background music.
SpeedPowerup
 
Sprite
The Sprite class represents a sprite with animations.
SpriteAnimation
The SpriteAnimation class represents an animation for a sprite.
Tile
 
TileManager
The TileManager class is responsible for managing the tiles in the game field.
TileType
 
Utils
The Utils class provides various utility methods for the game.
VestPowerup
